properties.entry: INSERT INTO WISHLIST ( NOTICE_NUM , USER_ID , WISH_NUM , WISH_STATUS ) VALUES ( ? , ? , WISH_NUM.NEXTVAL , DEFAULT )

SELECT *
FROM NOTICE N, CLASS C, WISHLIST W WHERE N.NOTICE_NUM = C.NOTICE_NUM AND N.NOTICE_NUM = W.NOTICE_NUM
AND WISH_STATUS = 'N' AND NOTICE_TYPE = '클래스' AND W.USER_ID = ? ORDER BY W.WISH_NUM DESC
